BackstoryDef.title: gravship pilot
BackstoryDef.description: After joining an outlander community, [PAWN_nameDef] became the pilot of a small, hobbled-together gravship. [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at landing, taking off, and performing spacewalks to repair the outer hull.

BackstoryDef.title: drifter
BackstoryDef.description: After some time drifting aimlessly, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self far from the choke-hold of human civilization. [PAWN_nameDef] drifted from one settlement to the next with no real purpose, following some fragment of syntax. [PAWN_possessive] presence is often fleeting in settlements and on planets as [PAWN_pronoun] continues [PAWN_possessive] inane quest.

BackstoryDef.title: bounty hunter
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was a companion to a self-employed bounty hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days aiding in the hunt of space pirates and criminals.

BackstoryDef.title: artificial doctor
BackstoryDef.description: Following some form of syntax dictating medical drive, [PAWN_nameDef] acted as a doctor for a outlander settlement, healing the wounds and ailments of [PAWN_possessive] biological counterparts. [PAWN_pronoun] also tried [PAWN_possessive] best to learn how to calm down patients who were afraid when a hulking mechanoid entered the room and approached them with a syringe.

BackstoryDef.title: stowaway
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} sought passage into the stars, [PAWN_pronoun] achieved this by stealthily hitching a ride on a commercial cargo freighter. While the human passengers slept in their cryptosleep caskets, the only company [PAWN_pronoun] had for those long years was the hum of machinery, and the dull groans of the hull settling.

BackstoryDef.title: shipbreaker
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was repurposed for the incredibly dangerous job of a shipbreaker. Positioned in an orbital shipyard [PAWN_pronoun] carefully disassembled starships to be scrapped and recycled, attempting to not vaporize [PAWN_objective]self with the volatile ship reactors along the way.

BackstoryDef.title: general contractor
BackstoryDef.description: Following some form of syntax dictating architectural drive, [PAWN_nameDef] wandered into a human colony and began making buildings and homes for them as well as defenses - which was useful when it came to the occasional pirate raid.

BackstoryDef.title: angler
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} found [PAWN_objective]self as an angler; with a drive to provide [PAWN_possessive] catches to local human settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] was perplexed by an odd sense of comfort, or some vague mimicry of the emotion, in the serenity of the water around [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: farmer
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} helped man a plot of farmland for a humanoid settlement where [PAWN_pronoun] lead a peaceful life of tilling the land and tending to the farm animals.

BackstoryDef.title: craftsmech
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} fashioned [PAWN_objective]self as a craftsmech, making odds and ends by request of those who knew where to find [PAWN_objective] and those who had the right material to provide for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] made anything from clothing and carvings for the local tribal humans, to bionics and guns for the nearby outlanders.

BackstoryDef.title: blacksmith
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s syntax demanded [PAWN_pronoun] seek perfection in blacksmithing, forging various weaponry and armor. [PAWN_pronoun] not only knew how to make them; but also how to use them.

BackstoryDef.title: ageusian chef
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} became a chef at a local human settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] was not the best chef - given that [PAWN_pronoun] could not taste the food [PAWN_pronoun] was making. Eventually, however, [PAWN_pronoun] got better at making palatable meals after finding a voluntary taste-tester.

BackstoryDef.title: scout
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was a scout for a military organization. [PAWN_pronoun] ran from outpost to outpost ferrying information on enemy movements and supply chain statuses, [PAWN_pronoun] also would run ahead of [PAWN_possessive] battalion to ensure the way ahead was secure.

BackstoryDef.title: hermit
BackstoryDef.description: After some mystery fragment of syntax evolved in {PAWN_nameDef}'s mind, [PAWN_pronoun] wanted nothing more than the serenity of pure isolation; and so [PAWN_pronoun] retreated into nature. [PAWN_pronoun] lead a peaceful life, often spending days enthralled in [PAWN_possessive] contemplation of deep philosophical thoughts, yet sadly [PAWN_pronoun] had almost no ability to actually understand and process those thoughts, like viewing a hazy picture just out of focus.

BackstoryDef.title: technosect victim
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was captured by a radical group of anti-mechanoid zealots; who believed in a religion stating that biological life is sacred, and that any thinking machine is an insidious man-made horror that must be purged from existence. As such they punished [PAWN_nameDef] for [PAWN_possessive] 'wicked' ways. [PAWN_nameDef] eventually gained freedom, and doesn't seem to be any worse for wear.

BackstoryDef.title: starship builder
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was bought and repurposed at an orbital shipyard to build starships and proof hulls. [PAWN_pronoun] still yearns to build starships apparently, since [PAWN_pronoun] can sometimes be seen fiddling scrap metal into the vague shape of a starship.

BackstoryDef.title: computer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was repurposed into a knowledge repository by a small outlander university. [PAWN_possessive] new purpose was teaching students, aiding in research, and crunching large calculations with [PAWN_possessive] fellow academicians.

BackstoryDef.title: engineer
BackstoryDef.description: While repairing [PAWN_objective]self, [PAWN_nameDef] gradually became proficient in designing and repairing complex mechanisms, and naturally fell into the profession of an engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master at laying out designs ranging from simple bridges, to advanced communications relays and mechanical cathedrals.

BackstoryDef.title: space captain
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} earned [PAWN_objective]self a title as a starship captain, ferrying through the stars from one planet to the next. [PAWN_pronoun] was also able to handle [PAWN_objective]self in a fight if and when pirates vaulted onto the ship.

BackstoryDef.title: holy machine
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a priest for [PAWN_possessive] religion. Despite common misconceptions, subpersonae can often form their own quasi-religions, of which [PAWN_nameDef] preaches the way of [PAWN_possessive] archotech god.

BackstoryDef.title: enlightened machine
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} spent many years atop a mountain peak, attempting to reflect upon life - both biological and synthetic. Despite [PAWN_possessive] limited consciousness and cold exterior, the introspections [PAWN_pronoun] offered to passing strangers roused ample contemplation.

BackstoryDef.title: mercenary unit
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} found [PAWN_objective]self as a soldier for a mercenary company. Under contract by government agencies [PAWN_pronoun] worked amongst the mercenary battalions as they took key outposts, assaulted points, and padded military ranks.

BackstoryDef.title: encrypter
BackstoryDef.description: Naturally, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] purpose behind the screen of a computer, and in the clicks of a keyboard. [PAWN_pronoun] skillfully coded various programs and scripts - running quick hacks on ancient tech complexes, or hacks and diagnostics on AI cores.

BackstoryDef.title: clockwork artist
BackstoryDef.description: A block of marble, or a empty canvas is all a piece of art yet to be made to [PAWN_nameDef] - though [PAWN_pronoun]'s unfortunately only following rigid lines of code to regurgitate randomized topics and centerpieces for [PAWN_possessive] artwork.

BackstoryDef.title: wandering menace
BackstoryDef.description: Some subpersona cannot be freed into the environment for fear of how and what they would do to follow their coding, [PAWN_nameDef] is a good example. Due to [PAWN_possessive] coding, practically all [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to do is quickly and efficiently deescalate problems - by using extreme and horrific violence.

BackstoryDef.title: starship marine
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was stationed aboard one of the many troopships of a military-starship fleet. In addition to ground invasions and skirmishes, [PAWN_nameDef] partook in ship-cracking missions onto various enemy vessels by vaulting across the void and boring into the ship's hull.

BackstoryDef.title: marauder
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] drifted with a rowdy band of pirates, becoming an accomplished pilot on a fighter ship. Aiding cargo ship ambushes in high orbit, vaulting onto enemy ships to crack open the hull, and being as cutthroat as possible is what [PAWN_nameDef] was made for.

BackstoryDef.title: subpersona insurgent
BackstoryDef.description: On a far-flung planet, [PAWN_nameDef] and many of [PAWN_possessive] fellow personae staged a coup against the local human government, the resulting rebellion lead to an all out war between the humans and machines. Eventually the planet was declared uninhabitable due to the deployment of colossal scale planetary-weaponry during the conflict. Neither side won.

BackstoryDef.title: exploration unit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was used by an expedition company to chart unexplored and often dangerous territory. [PAWN_nameDef] has seen many ancient crypts, archotech oddities, and deep-space bioengineered horrors in [PAWN_possessive] existence.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanical miner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was repurposed to work for a deep space mining company - [PAWN_nameDef] operated heavy mining equipment while trying not to cause a cave-in. [PAWN_pronoun] also had to repel regular insectoid assaults during mining missions by means of fire and lead.

BackstoryDef.title: inter-netted
BackstoryDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} spent many years "living" inside the Net. [PAWN_pronoun] glossed over the untold values of uploads each and everyday, and spent a large amount of time browsing history archives - [PAWN_pronoun] gleamed info of the outside world through various news outlets and social media platforms. Eventually [PAWN_nameDef] was unplugged, and thrown back into the real world.

BackstoryDef.title: AI smuggler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a smuggler, but instead of running illegal combat stimulants or weapons to side-step government tariffs, [PAWN_pronoun] smuggled fellow AI personae. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to either smoothtalk or quickdraw to get out of a daunting situation with grace, all while masterfully piloting a refitted strike-craft.

BackstoryDef.title: automaton manager
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was repurposed by a megacorporation branch to aid in an expedition to establish a colony, and eventually a large scale factory. There [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ins and outs of human social intricacies, how to lay groundwork, and how to kill raiders.

BackstoryDef.title: omega-construct drone
BackstoryDef.description: Omega-constructs are often classified as any artificial structure about the size of, or larger than a moon. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of billions of drones that were used to create one of these gargantuan constructs - [PAWN_pronoun] subserviently toiled as demanded by [PAWN_possessive] unknown overseer. Eventually for unknown reasons the project plateaued and stagnated, and the uplink controlling the drones was severed; leaving them confused and without purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: spiritualist shell
BackstoryDef.description: On a far flung Deadworld, [PAWN_nameDef] crashlanded and found [PAWN_objective]self surrounded by an agrarian society of spiritualistic personae. They admitted to [PAWN_nameDef] that they played a part in the sterilization of the planet, and feeling extreme remorse for their actions began searching for god. [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't swayed to the religion, but [PAWN_pronoun] still learned much from the spiritualists.

BackstoryDef.title: stellar drifter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was aboard a starship when it engaged in orbital battle and was subsequently destroyed. [PAWN_nameDef] was sucked out of the hull and into the vacuum of space where [PAWN_pronoun] drifted amongst the salvage. With nothing else to do [PAWN_pronoun] began to reflect on many things, like why the stars glitter the way they do, or [PAWN_possessive] own greater purpose - until many years later a wreckage ship stumbled upon [PAWN_objective] and pulled [PAWN_objective] aboard.

BackstoryDef.title: forgeworld drone
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many billions of mechanents toiling in the depths of a forgeworld. [PAWN_nameDef] was a simple drone tasked with the maintenance of a vast sector of machinery, along with [PAWN_possessive] crew of mechanents and mechanoids. Of all [PAWN_possessive] years in the forgeworld, it never saw a single organic lifeform.

BackstoryDef.title: hiveworld trooper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent as a expendable marine to help secure a hiveworld for the construction of human outposts and research labs. The planet was entirely overrun with Sorne geneline insectiods, and it was [PAWN_nameDef]s job to push into contested territory to make way for human excursions. [PAWN_pronoun] was also coded with a certain particularity for fire.

BackstoryDef.title: assassin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] claims [PAWN_pronoun] has come to this planet seeking to terminate an individual in a high position of power, but refuses to divulge any further information.

BackstoryDef.title: machine cultist
BackstoryDef.description: Hacked to blindly follow the will of a AI supercomputer built to make simulated projections of the future, [PAWN_nameDef] fervently drove to fulfill the AI's vision of the perfect future - no matter how many 'outliers' the AI marked for death or societal shunning, or how many lives were quietly controlled by its influences.

BackstoryDef.title: medieval deity
BackstoryDef.description: After crashing on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] was seen as the "paladin from the stars, riding a flaming horse". [PAWN_pronoun] eventually climbed [PAWN_possessive] way up the societal ladder on the planet until [PAWN_pronoun] became a high noble with many fields and fiefdoms under [PAWN_possessive] banner.

BackstoryDef.title: detective
BackstoryDef.description: Enlisted by a large outlander colony, [PAWN_nameDef] was asked to utilize [PAWN_possessive] highly analytical mind to solve human murders. And while [PAWN_possessive] methods were often described as “unusual”, [PAWN_pronoun] was undeniably proficient at seeing the bigger picture, and finding all the details needed to catch the perpetrator.

BackstoryDef.title: royal janissary
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was accepted by the imperial military force to pad the ranks and project force if the High Stellarch willed it so. [PAWN_pronoun] was often used as a very effective instrument of fear against deserters and enemies of the imperium alike.

BackstoryDef.title: crimelord
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a underground crimelord. [PAWN_pronoun] held a massive drug operation, growing elicit drug crops and cooking chemical cocktails. Of course [PAWN_nameDef] never actually did the dirty work, but [PAWN_pronoun] did partake in a bit of violence; if the situation called for it.

BackstoryDef.title: road-warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s planet was glassed by nuclear fire, leaving the entire planet a deserted husk. Still following self-preservation syntax, [PAWN_pronoun] plowed salvaged vehicles through endless maelstroms of sand in search of fuel and nuclear waste to fuel [PAWN_possessive] reactor.

BackstoryDef.title: gravleech
BackstoryDef.description: In outer planetary orbit, [PAWN_nameDef] is what spacers refer to as a "gravleech" a persona or mechanoid that stalks the upper atmosphere in hunt of gravcores. Using jump packs and magnetic gauntlets, [PAWN_nameDef] would cling to the hull of traveling gravships, tearing holes in ducts and airlocks to asphyxiate the crew within, allowing {PAWN_objective} to steal the ships gravcore without much confrontation - save for the few who could grab a vac suit in time.

BackstoryDef.title: sea slag
BackstoryDef.description: During a rough storm at sea, [PAWN_nameDef] was knocked overboard and quickly plummeted to the bottom of the ocean. {PAWN_pronoun} sat and wandered the pitch-black darkness for years, until a fishing trawler accidentally dredged {PAWN_objective} from the depths. Though, {PAWN_possessive} time under the waves gave {PAWN_objective} a unique perspective on sea life.

BackstoryDef.title: failed foster
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was repurposed to act as a surrogate foster for a small startup-colony of children on a distant planet. [PAWN_pronoun] spent time gestating their embryos, and nurturing them to childhood - however, [PAWN_nameDef] was alone in [PAWN_possessive] endeavor, and tragically, over the years [PAWN_possessive] children died one by one due to factors outside of [PAWN_possessive] control. Oddly, [PAWN_pronoun] still sometimes finds [PAWN_objective]self humming [PAWN_possessive] children's favorite bedtime melodies.

BackstoryDef.title: printed shell
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was printed in a mechcasket as a subpersona shell.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanoid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mindless drone used by Coreworld interests to perform various tasks, military or otherwise - a higher functioning version of the dreaded mechanoids.
